code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ViewOrders=()=>{const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:8080/getAllOrders").then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setOrders(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching orders:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"All Orders"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table table-striped table-hover",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Order ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Consumer Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Product Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date of Order"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:orders.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:order.order_id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:order.consumer?`${order.consumer.first_name} ${order.consumer.last_name}`:'Unknown'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:order.product?order.product.model_name:'Unknown'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:order.date_of_order})]},order.order_id))})]})]});};export default ViewOrders;
